name: Achievement Lurker: Respectable Accomplishment
description: The world of Ashendalila is a dark and terrible place, but one hero will outshine the rest. To accomplish what most dream of, but a heroes' work is never done. Monsters roam the world and try to stop the accomplishers from accomplishing the accomplishment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 1 GB available space
